add_test_pl_tests(
    "$<TARGET_FILE:jbmc> --validate-goto-model --validate-ssa-equation"
)

add_test_pl_profile(
    "strings-smoke-tests-symex-driven-lazy-loading"
    "$<TARGET_FILE:jbmc> --validate-goto-model --validate-ssa-equation --symex-driven-lazy-loading"

)
